feed.title: System Optimization Lab
feed.subtitle: SOLE (System Optimization Lab @ East China Normal University) · 华东师范大学系统优化实验室

entry.title: SOLERs Graduated!
entry.content:
The first batch of master students in SOLE has successfully passed their thesis oral defense and get their master’s degrees. Congratulation to them and wish them all the best for the future.

实验室第一届硕士研究生顺利通过答辩，并获得硕士学位。 祝贺他们，祝愿他们有美好的前程！
entry.summary: The first batch of master students in SOLE has successfully passed their thesis oral defense and get their master’s degrees. Congratulation to them and wish them all the best for the future.

entry.title: Paper Accepted by Journal of Systems and Software

link.title: Paper Accepted by Journal of Systems and Software

entry.content:
May, 2024. Paper EFACT: An External Function Auto-Completion Tool to strengthen static binary lifting was accepted by Journal of Systems and Software. Congratulations to Yilei.

PDF

Source Code
entry.summary: May, 2024. Paper EFACT: An External Function Auto-Completion Tool to strengthen static binary lifting was accepted by Journal of Systems and Software. Congratulations to Yilei.

entry.title: Paper Accepted by IEEE TPDS
entry.content:
Dec., 2023. Paper TCSA: Efficient Localization of Busy-Wait Synchronization Bugs for Latency-Critical Applications was accepted by IEEE TPDS. Congratulations to Ning Li.

PDF

Source Code
entry.summary: Dec., 2023. Paper TCSA: Efficient Localization of Busy-Wait Synchronization Bugs for Latency-Critical Applications was accepted by IEEE TPDS. Congratulations to Ning Li.

entry.title: Paper Accepted by ACM TACO
entry.content:
Sep., 2023. Paper Efficient Cross-platform Multiplexing of Hardware Performance Counters via Adaptive Grouping was accepted by ACM TACO. Congratulations to Tong-yu.

PDF (Open Access)

Source Code
entry.summary: Sep., 2023. Paper Efficient Cross-platform Multiplexing of Hardware Performance Counters via Adaptive Grouping was accepted by ACM TACO. Congratulations to Tong-yu.

entry.title: SOLERs Received Scholarships!
entry.content:
Congratulations to Tong-yu Liu and Wenlong Mu for being awarded the National Scholarship (Master Student) for the 2022 academic year!

Also, congratulations to Han Yujie for being awarded the Third Class Corporate Scholarship of DaSE.

祝贺刘通宇与牟文龙获得2022学年国家奖学金（硕士）！

也祝贺韩宇捷获得数据科学与工程学院企业奖学金三等奖！
entry.summary: Congratulations to Tong-yu Liu and Wenlong Mu for being awarded the National Scholarship (Master Student) for the 2022 academic year!

entry.title: SOLE Was Established!
entry.content:
In September of 2021, SOLE Labs was officially established!

The lab welcomed its first students, including 2 PhD students, 6 full-time master students and 4 part-time master students.
entry.summary: In September of 2021, SOLE Labs was officially established!
